definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. pass. pl. [[סִירִים סְבֻכִים]] Na 1:10 interwoven (entangled) thorns (cf. Da); Gunkel:ZAW xiii (1893), 235 prop. (after LXX Targum Vollers) [[כְּסוּחִים]] i.e. cut off, away (Is 33:12) cf. Now; text very dub.

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 mpl. [[עַל־גַּל שָׁרָשָׁיו יְסֻבָָּכוּ]] Job 8:17 are interwoven (in a tangled mass).
